## Getting Started 

* Set up a JavaFX project
* [Download starter code](https://github.com/picoral/CSC210SA09)

## Short Assignment 09

* Read the starter code, and work on TODOs
* Make it look nicer
* Add another type of food (create new class, add buttons to interface)

## Submit Short Assignment video

* Record a demonstration video of your application working
* The window title should have your name on it
* Show App.java header with term (Fall 2024) and your name in the header
* [Submit video link to Gradescope](https://www.gradescope.com/courses/839822/assignments/5238793) -- make sure people other than yourself can play the video
